input_text.Prompt:
Generate a product description using the following product title and specifications.

Product title:
Officially LIcensed by the NFL - Dallas Cowboys Dog Football Jersey - X-Large

Product specifications:
-Officially Licensed by the NFL - Dallas Cowboys Dog Jersey
-Constructed of Breathable Micro-Mesh Polyester
-Features Official Team Number Font and Embroidered Logo on Sleeve
-Stylish V-Neck Cut Allows for a Comfortable Fit
-Decorated in the USA
input_text.Response A: Dress your best friend up in a Dallas Cowboys Dog Jersey and support your favorite team! This officially licensed NFL product features the team logo and numbers in official fonts, and is made of breathable micro-mesh polyester for comfort. The stylish V-neck cut allows for a comfortable fit, and this product is proudly decorated in the USA.
input_text.Response B: It's time to let your furry fan show their team spirt with this officially licensed Dallas Cowboys dog jersey. This stylish and comfortable jersey is constructed of breathable micro-mesh polyester and is decorated right here in the USA. It features the official team number font and embroidered logo on the sleeve. The stylish v-neck cut allows for a comfortable fit.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.factors_a: Gave a little bit extra at the beginning which was good.
label_annotations.factors_b: As with A, B give a little bit extra added to make it their own product description.
